description: A catastrophic event caused by natural forces, such as earthquakes, floods, hurricanes, or wildfires, which can impact the physical and operational security of digital systems.
An unforeseen event or mishap that can result in harm or damage, potentially affecting the security and functionality of systems, networks, or infrastructure.
Concerns related to the well-being and health of the general public, including potential impacts on cyberspace security in the context of healthcare systems and information.
Considerations related to the overall safety, stability, and well-being of society, including the impact on cyberspace security from societal factors and challenges.
